snippet: Competition is fierce among credit-card issuers, creating some lucrative rewards for those willing to switch.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column notes CreditCards.com survey finds many Americans tend to be loyal to their credit cards, even when they are aware of better offers; offers Q&A on switching credit cards.
lead_paragraph: Competition is fierce among credit-card issuers, creating some lucrative rewards for those willing to switch.

headline.print_headline: Maybe It’s Time to Look at New Credit Card Offers for a Better Deal
headline.main: Maybe It’s Time to Look at New Credit Card Offers
